a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual working hours per worker, various sources, France
Comparison of various sources of annual working hours estimates. Note that not all sources publish data for every country.
Data source: OECD (2020); Feenstra et al. (2015), PWT (2021); Bick et al. (2019); Huberman & Minns (2007)
Note: OECD data refers to average annual hours actually worked per worker; PWT data refers to average annual hours worked by persons engaged; Bick et al data
refers to average annual hours worked per employed person; Huberman & Minns data refers to annual hours of full-time production workers (male and female) in
